title: Ep. 167: Mauled by a Grizzly
itunes:title: Ep. 167: Mauled by a Grizzly
description:
Steven Rinella talks with Amber Kornak and Janis Putelis.

Subjects discussed: The polite way to address someone who has suffered a bear “tragedy”; Janis's chicken egg business; what it’s like for female wildlife biologists; hair snares; the precise moment when you realize you’re about to be attacked by a grizzly; where to carry bear spray and how to hose a grizz with it; biophilia; tattooing bears; and more.

 

Connect with Steve and MeatEater
